attributes.action: We demand immediate expulsion from the UK of any UK country returning to EU.
attributes.additional_details: With the EU attacking our decision to leave the EU by trying to entice misguided MPs of devolved parliaments to rejoin, it is important to protect our democracy, protect our economy and protect our assets.
attributes.background: During the referendum, it was decided democratically to leave the EU. Any UK country attempting to overture this decision needs expelled from the UK.
